name: mcp-server-xlwings
description: Excel automation via xlwings COM. DRM-protected files, live sessions, VBA macros. Windows only.

tools.name: get_active_workbook
tools.description: Get active workbook info, sheets, and current selection

tools.name: manage_workbooks
tools.description: List, open, save, close, or recalculate workbooks

tools.name: read_data
tools.description: Read a range with merge_info, header_row, and sheet=* batch read

tools.name: write_data
tools.description: Write a 2D array or a single-cell formula

tools.name: manage_sheets
tools.description: List, add, delete, rename, copy sheets. Insert/delete rows and columns

tools.name: find_replace
tools.description: Search for text, optionally replace it

tools.name: format_range
tools.description: Apply formatting (bold, italic, color, borders, alignment, etc.)

tools.name: run_macro
tools.description: Execute a VBA macro and get its return value

tools.name: get_formulas
tools.description: Get all formulas in a range with optional calculated values

tools.name: get_cell_styles
tools.description: Get formatting/style info for cells in a range

tools.name: get_objects
tools.description: List charts, images, and shapes on a sheet
